name: Messy Office -Hidden Objects For Fun
description:
>- 18 Unique and Interesting Messy Office .can you Clean all of Office ?

After Success of Messy Kitchen Hidden Objects,Messy Room hidden Objects. & Messy Street.then its Time to Clean Messy office Hidden Objects .

>- Universal app!! enjoy it in iphone and ipad.

Messy Office Hidden Objects is now free!

It's the time to use your observing skills to discover the hidden objects in the Messy Office .Find the hidden objects in short duration to get high score.
The benefit to causing a mess when you know magic, is it only takes a Few minutes to tidy the worst of messes!

Try not to make mistakes; wrong click then Decrease your time and Score.

Time is also imported for high score.


How to play:-

-> you have to find out Messy Office hidden object and other things in the unique and different backgrounds as early as possible within minimum time.

-> Hint option available for your help,but use it carefully it deducts your start.

-> Every level completed you got a coin! so play fair and fast to get 5 stars!

-> If you can share this app on facebook and Twitter then you will get some coin.

-> Game center leader boards to compare with friends & family!

Available as Universal app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch!

Lets Download Free and Get it today For Fun!

if u like it! please rate it.
